mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, password, name, email) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id FROM user u JOIN auto_budget_policy p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.auto_enabled = true ORDER BY u.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_budget_policy ( user_id, auto_enabled, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{autoEnabled}, #{updatedBy} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE auto_enabled = VALUES(auto_enabled), updated_by = VALUES(updated_by), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
